requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or better.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
